name: microwaveTimer_setValue
description: This function is used to set the cooking time of the microwave.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the device is located.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the device is located.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to set the cooking time of the microwave.

parameters.name: cookingTimer
parameters.description: The cooking time to be set for the microwave in either minutes or seconds.
